solution_line_template: It would take Lily {total_words} words / {typing_speed} wpm = <<{total_words}/{typing_speed}={typing_time_no_break}>>{typing_time_no_break} minutes to type without taking a break.
Since Lily takes a break after 10 minutes of typing she takes {typing_time_no_break} minutes + {break_duration} minutes = {total_time} minutes
